readable.content: A man and a woman holding two young boys are sitting on a park bench , posing for a photograph . A man , woman , and two young boys are sitting on a bench with flowers in the background . There is a man , woman and two boys sitting on a bench . Two adults and two children pose on a park bench . Two adults and two children sit on a park bench .
